ModuleTitle: Adv Topics Molecular, Cellular & Developmental Biology
ModuleDescription:
This course fulfils one of the upper division requirements for the Life
Science Major. This course aims to be an advanced research seminar examining the latest
findings in Molecular, Cellular and Developmental Biology. The focus will be on analysis of primary literature. Students will work on scientific writing and presentation.
Prerequisite:
At least one required :
YSC3233 Molecular Cell Biology OR
YSC3238 Developmental Biology, OR
YSC2233 Genetics OR
YSC3214 Biochemistry OR
With the permission of the instructor
